sentence: There is, er, other big news today, but another poll out this morning shows Georgia governor Brian Kemp not only leading his primary against former senator David Perdue, but well ahead of the 50 percent threshold to avoid a runoff.

title: Not Exactly a Nailbiter in the Georgia GOP Primaries

title: The 2022 elections could determine the fate of abortion access for years in a number of major swing states.
